title: Navigation Menu
description: A navigation menu that can be assigned to a theme navigation area.

id.description: The unique ID of the navigation menu.

contextId.description: The journal, press or preprint server ID. Use 0 for site-level menus.

title.description: The title of the navigation menu.

areaName.description: The theme navigation area this menu is assigned to.

menuTree.description: The menu tree structure for assigned items. Format: menuTree[menuItemId] = {seq: number, parentId: number|null}.

seq.description: The sequence order of the item.

parentId.description: The parent menu item ID for nested items.
